verses.verse: Does not wisdom<WH2451> call,<WH7121> And understanding<WH8394> lift<WH5414> up her voice<WH6963>?
On top<WH7218> of the heights<WH4791> beside<WH5921> the way,<WH1870> Where<WH1004> the paths<WH9350> meet,<WH9052> she takes<WH5324> her stand;<WH5324>
Beside<WH3027> the gates,<WH8179> at the opening<WH6310> to the city,<WH7176> At the entrance<WH3996> of the doors,<WH6607> she cries<WH7442> out:
"To you, O men,<WH376> I call,<WH7121> And my voice<WH6963> is to the sons<WH1121> of men.<WH120>
"O naive<WH6612> ones,<WH6612> discern<WH995> prudence;<WH6195> And, O fools,<WH3684> discern<WH995> wisdom.<WH3820>
"Listen,<WH8085> for I shall speak<WH1696> noble<WH5057> things;<WH5057> And the opening<WH4669> of my lips<WH8193> [will produce] right<WH4339> things.<WH4339>
"For my mouth<WH2441> will utter<WH1897> truth;<WH571> And wickedness<WH7562> is an abomination<WH8441> to my lips.<WH8193>
"All<WH3605> the utterances<WH561> of my mouth<WH6310> are in righteousness;<WH6664> There<WH369> is nothing<WH369> crooked<WH6617> or perverted<WH6141> in them.
"They are all<WH3605> straightforward<WH5228> to him who understands,<WH995> And right<WH3477> to those who find<WH4672> knowledge.<WH1847>
"Take<WH3947> my instruction,<WH4148> and not silver,<WH3701> And knowledge<WH1847> rather<WH4480> than<WH4480> choicest<WH977> gold.<WH2742>
"For wisdom<WH2451> is better<WH2896> than<WH4480> jewels;<WH6443> And all<WH3605> desirable<WH2656> things<WH2656> can not compare<WH9586> with her.
"I, wisdom,<WH2451> dwell<WH7931> with prudence,<WH6195> And I find<WH4672> knowledge<WH1847> [and] discretion.<WH4209>
"The fear<WH3374> of the Lord<WH3068> is to hate<WH8130> evil;<WH9563> Pride<WH1344> and arrogance<WH1344> and the evil<WH9563> way,<WH1870> And the perverted<WH8419> mouth,<WH6310> I hate.<WH8130>
"Counsel<WH6098> is mine and sound<WH8454> wisdom;<WH8454> I am understanding,<WH998> power<WH1369> is mine.
"By me kings<WH4428> reign,<WH4427> And rulers<WH7336> decree<WH2710> justice.<WH6664>
"By me princes<WH8269> rule,<WH8323> and nobles,<WH5081> All<WH3605> who judge<WH8199> rightly.<WH6664>
"I love<WH157> those who love<WH157> me; And those who diligently<WH7836> seek<WH7836> me will find<WH4672> me.
"Riches<WH6239> and honor<WH9202> are with me, Enduring<WH6276> wealth<WH1952> and righteousness.<WH6666>
"My fruit<WH6529> is better<WH2896> than<WH4480> gold,<WH2742> even pure<WH6337> gold,<WH6337> And my yield<WH8393> than<WH4480> choicest<WH977> silver.<WH3701>
"I walk<WH1980> in the way<WH734> of righteousness,<WH6666> In the midst<WH8432> of the paths<WH9350> of justice,<WH4941>
To endow<WH5157> those who love<WH157> me with wealth,<WH3426> That I may fill<WH4390> their treasuries.<WH214>
"The Lord<WH3068> possessed<WH7069> me at the beginning<WH7225> of His way,<WH1870> Before<WH6924> His works<WH4659> of old.<WH6924>
"From everlasting<WH5769> I was established,<WH9332> From the beginning,<WH7218> from the earliest<WH6924> times<WH6924> of the earth.<WH776>
"When there<WH369> were no<WH369> depths<WH8415> I was brought<WH9123> forth,<WH9123> When there<WH369> were no<WH369> springs<WH4599> abounding<WH3513> with water.<WH4325>
"Before<WH2962> the mountains<WH2022> were settled,<WH2883> Before<WH6440> the hills<WH1389> I was brought<WH9123> forth;<WH9123>
While<WH5704> He had not yet made<WH6213> the earth<WH776> and the fields,<WH2351> Nor<WH3808> the first<WH7218> dust<WH6083> of the world.<WH8398>
"When He established<WH3559> the heavens,<WH8064> I was there,<WH8033> When He inscribed<WH2710> a circle<WH2329> on the face<WH6440> of the deep,<WH8415>
When He made<WH553> firm<WH553> the skies<WH7834> above,<WH4480> <WH4605> When the springs<WH9407> of the deep<WH8415> became<WH5810> fixed,<WH5810>

When He set<WH7760> for the sea<WH3220> its boundary,<WH2706> So that the water<WH4325> should not transgress<WH5674> His command,<WH6310> When He marked<WH2710> out the foundations<WH4144> of the earth;<WH776>
Then I was beside<WH681> Him, [as] a master<WH525> workman;<WH525> And I was daily<WH3117> [His] delight,<WH8191> Rejoicing<WH7832> always<WH3605> <WH6256> before<WH6440> Him,
Rejoicing<WH7832> in the world,<WH8398> His earth,<WH776> And [having] my delight<WH8191> in the sons<WH1121> of men.<WH120>
"Now<WH6258> therefore, [O] sons,<WH1121> listen<WH8085> to me, For blessed<WH835> are they who keep<WH8104> my ways.<WH1870>
"Heed<WH8085> instruction<WH4148> and be wise,<WH2449> And do not neglect<WH6544> [it.]
"Blessed<WH835> is the man<WH120> who listens<WH8085> to me, Watching<WH8245> daily<WH3117> at my gates,<WH1817> Waiting<WH8104> at my doorposts.<WH4201>
"For he who finds<WH4672> me finds<WH4672> life,<WH9132> And obtains<WH6329> favor<WH7522> from the Lord.<WH3068>
"But he who sins<WH2398> against me injures<WH2554> himself;<WH5315> All<WH3605> those who hate<WH8130> me love<WH157> death.<WH4194>"
